mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ORDER BY RENTALDATE DESC;
SELECT ID, A.BOOKTITLE AS BOOKNAME, RENTALDATE, RETURNDATE, RETURNORNOT FROM BOOKLIST A INNER JOIN RENTAL B ON A.BOOKCODE = B.BOOKCODE WHERE ID = #{id} ORDER BY RENTALDATE DESC

SELECT ID, A.BOOKTITLE AS BOOKNAME, RENTALDATE, RETURNDATE, RETURNORNOT FROM BOOKLIST A INNER JOIN RENTAL B ON A.BOOKCODE = B.BOOKCODE WHERE ID = #{id} AND B.RENTALDATE <= SYSDATE AND SYSDATE <= B.RETURNDATE AND B.RETURNORNOT != 1 ORDER BY RENTALDATE DESC
